cards.description: Whenever you release a ori:Special, reduce the ori:Cooldown of other ori:Specials in skill slot by 1 (2) (Reduce to 1 at most).

cards.name: Crazy Skill

cards.name: Detached

relics.name: Kuro's Feather
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 2 ori:Slow-Descent.
relics.flavorText: It used to be a feather to help your companion fly, but now it's fully fledged.

relics.name: Ancient Light
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 ori:Ancient-Force.

relics.name: Light Catcher
relics.description: At the end of your turn, gain 3 Block for each available ori:Specials in the skill slot.
relics.flavorText: This grass grows in the dark and can catch any faint light.

relics.name: Iron Needle
relics.description: When unload ori:Special, reduce the ori:Cooldown by 5 for other Specials in skill slot instead of 3.
relics.flavorText: A compass. It should have been returned to Tokk, but could not be returned for a while.

relics.name: Meteor Thruster
relics.description: At the start of each combat, reduce the ori:Cooldown to 0 for all ori:Specials in draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Let you dart like a meteor into the enemy's face.

relics.name: Ancient Blaze
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 2 ori:Inflame to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Fluorescent Powder
relics.description: ori:Inflame will settle once when applied to a non-Inflame target.

relics.name: Dead Trunk
relics.description: The first time you enter ori:Air each turn, add a Driftwood into your hand.
relics.flavorText: A small section of trunk, long since completely dried up, was found in a pool of water.

relics.name: Special Encyclopedia
relics.flavorText: It records advanced techniques for all specials.

potions.name: Special Potion
potions.description: Reduce the Cooldown of all Specials in skill slot to 0.

keywords.name: Air
keywords.description:
In this Stance, discard an equal amount of cards from the left side of the hand instead of spending [E] .
Exit this Stance when draw cards.

keywords.name: Ancient Force
keywords.description: Ancient Force adds additional damage to Specials.

keywords.name: Approach
keywords.description:
You can Bash Approached creatures.
Hold down the right mouse button to enter bullet time.
In Bullet Time, a progress bar appears before an enemy attack arrives.
Release right button to Bash: Enter Air, negate damage from this enemy in 0.04 seconds.
You can only Approach one enemy at most.

keywords.name: Barrier
keywords.description: If you Approach creatures with Barrier, 50% of damage taken from enemies is shared by this creature(cannot share overflow damage).

keywords.name: Bash
keywords.description:
When there are Approached creatures in the room, Hold down and release the right mouse to perform a Bash.
Bash can negate damage from Approached creature in 0.04 seconds and made you enter Air.

keywords.name: Cooldown
keywords.description:
The number at the top left corner of Special.
If Special is in skill slot, each card played can reduce its Cooldown by 1.
When Cooldown reaches 0, you can release its effects manually or automatically (No turns inside or outside).

keywords.name: Inflame
keywords.description:
Inflame creatures cannot have Block.
Lose HP equals to 10% of their Max HP at the start of their turn.
Each turn, Inflame is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Place
keywords.description: Spawn neural creatures in current room.

keywords.name: Slow Descent
keywords.description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw cards equal to the amount of Slow Descent then half the amount.

keywords.name: Special
keywords.description:
A new type of cards.
This card will enter skill slot when used.

Right click the skill slot can unload Special to discard pile, meanwhile reduce the Cooldown by 3 for other Specials in skill slot.
